text:
💊 #treatment 💊 list still looking 👍 based on all *public* data

▶️ #remdesivir main issue is cost (~$1K per day)

▶️ #favilavir / #favipiravir still an outlier IMO.  🇯🇵 has a huge supply, *prob. enough to export 

▶️ #chloroquine may be for 'moderate' Rx

#COVID19 #CoronaVirus https://t.co/6n8JMjcheF
